00041 #ifndef __UDT_CACHE_H__
00042 #define __UDT_CACHE_H__
00043 
00044 #include "udt.h"
00045 #include "common.h"
00046 #include <set>
00047 #include <map>
00048 
00049 
00050 class CUDT;
00051 
00052 struct CInfoBlock
00053 {
00054    uint32_t m_piIP[4];
00055    int m_iIPversion;
00056    uint64_t m_ullTimeStamp;
00057    int m_iRTT;
00058    int m_iBandwidth;
00059    int m_iLossRate;
00060    int m_iReorderDistance;
00061    double m_dInterval;
00062    double m_dCWnd;
00063 };
00064 
00065 struct CIPComp
00066 {
00067    bool operator()(const CInfoBlock* ib1, const CInfoBlock* ib2) const;
00068 };
00069 
00070 struct CTSComp
00071 {
00072    bool operator()(const CInfoBlock* ib1, const CInfoBlock* ib2) const;
00073 };
00074 
00075 class CCache
00076 {
00077 public:
00078    CCache();
00079    CCache(const unsigned int& size);
00080    ~CCache();
00081 
00082 public:
00083    int lookup(const sockaddr* addr, const int& ver, CInfoBlock* hb);
00084    void update(const sockaddr* addr, const int& ver, CInfoBlock* hb);
00085 
00086 private:
00087    void convert(const sockaddr* addr, const int& ver, uint32_t* ip);
00088 
00089 private:
00090    unsigned int m_uiSize;
00091    std::set<CInfoBlock*, CIPComp> m_sIPIndex;
00092    std::set<CInfoBlock*, CTSComp> m_sTSIndex;
00093 
00094    pthread_mutex_t m_Lock;
00095 
00096 private:
00097    CCache(const CCache&);
00098    CCache& operator=(const CCache&);
00099 };

00101 #endif
